研究人员在了解tau蛋白在阿尔茨海默氏症中的作用方面取得了突破科隆大学的一个研究团队在了解tau蛋白在阿尔茨海默氏病中的作用方面取得了重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/researchers-make-break-trough-in-in-underding-the-the-the-tau-tau-tau-protein-in-alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/researchers-make-breakthough-in-in-underding-the-the-the-the-tau-tau-protein-in-alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=687E0536-7AC3-4D19-B846-2607F9D75A69 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 11:42:05 -0500 Researchers make breakthrough in understanding the role of tau protein in Alzheimer's
卫生组织合作解决稀有疾病日2025年的特发性肺纤维化美国胸部医师学院（胸部），PF勇士，罕见的疾病多样性联盟（RDDC） - 黑人妇女健康命令和全国社区卫生工作者协会（NACHW）宣布他们的合作，以解决罕见疾病的慢性病，​​以解决特发性肺纤维化（IPF），以解决罕见疾病的慢性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/health-ealth-organizations-collaborate-to-address-idiopathic-pulonary-pulonary-fibrosis--on-disease-disease-day-day-20255.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/health-ealth-organizations-collaborate-to-address-idiopathic-pulonary-fibrosiss-on-rare-disease-disease-day-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5251A8F9-A356-43DC-92A6-490B4DC568D6 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 11:25:43 -0500 Health organizations collaborate to address idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis on Rare Disease Day 2025
有史以来首次临床试验评估非诺贝特作为HPV相关癌症的治疗来自大学医院的团队Seidman癌症中心正在启动该国的首次临床试验，该试验评估了胆固醇药物Fenodibrate（Traglide，Fibricor，Lipofen），作为HPV+宫颈+宫颈+ HPV+ HPV+头部和颈部癌症患者的研究和潜在治疗方法（HNSCC）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/first-everst-ever-clinical-trials-trials-trials-evaluate-fenute-fenofrate-aas-warteatment-for-hpv for-hpv与hpv相关 - cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/first-eprst-ever-clinical-trials-trials-trials-evaluate-fenute-fenofrate-fenofrate-as-wartement-for-hpv for-hpv相关 - cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d40433d-b30e-417d-bbda-0c8000611d43 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 11:14:25 -0500 First-ever clinical trials evaluate fenofibrate as treatment for HPV-related cancers
在埃及乳制品中发现的广泛的大肠杆菌污染每次吃或喝酒时，都不需要害怕食物中毒，但是即使在21世纪，现实仍然存在风险。大阪大都会大学领导的日本研究小组发现，大肠杆菌在埃及的25％的流行牛奶和乳制品中普遍存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/widepread-e-coli-contamination-found-in----in-egyptian-dairy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/widespread-e-coli-contamination-found-in---in-------in-egyptian-dairy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f81AED2B-350F-4286-9159-6B6B6C87582878 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 07:22:00 -0500 Widespread E. coli contamination found in Egyptian dairy
锁定对压力进食的影响在第一次Covid-19锁定期间，维也纳大学的研究人员评估了在奥地利，意大利和德国的近800名参与者中，压力，情绪和社交互动对“不健康”饮食习惯的影响。令人惊讶的是，结果表明，负面的情绪和较少的社交互动导致“不健康”食品消费和享受的减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/impact-off-lockdown-on-on-stress-eating.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/impact-off-lockdown-on-on-stress-eating.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03Def71c-c7d9-4b6b-8fcd-28ff4ff4026a58f Fri, 28 Feb 2025 07:11:23 -0500 Impact of lockdown on stress eating
AI以高精度检测结直肠癌Jyväskylä大学已经开发了一种新的基于AI的工具，用于鉴定组织样品分析中的大肠癌。新的人工神经网络模型超过了其分类性能的所有前辈。该工具也已免费提供。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/ai-detects-colororectal-cancer-with-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/ai-detects-coleorectal-cancer-with-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b3c4cb2-b2-b2-ef-41b5-99e4-711f7b414e15 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 07:00:25 -0500 AI detects colorectal cancer with high accuracy
